author: Gandhi
message: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever

author: Frank Ocean
message: Whatever you do, never run back to what broke you.
Don't Trust The Right Thing Done For The Wrong Reason
Accident Is The First Building Block Of Evolution
Our Survival Instinct Is Our Single Greatest Source Of Inspiration
Once You’re A Parent, You’re The Ghost Of Your Children’s Future
You have to leave something behind to go forward
No parent should have to watch their own child die
Power, prosperity and legacy doesn't give you happiness and peace
